item.title: Lista de libros
item.description: Información interesante: https://geocompr.robinlovelace.net/ https://rspatial.org/raster/ https://rstudio.github.io/renv/articles/renv.html https://happygitwithr.com/ https://community.rstudio.com/t/inserting-citations-and-blogdown/22556/2 https://rviews.rstudio.com/2019/06/19/a-gentle-intro-to-tidymodels/ https://serialmentor.com/dataviz/ Pasos para crear un blog. https://keen-swartz-3146c4.netlify.com/ Blogdown https://bookdown.org/yihui/blogdown/
